author: Simon Difford
description: This deep cherry red Negroni-like aperitivo is equally tasty shaken and served straight-up â€“ indeed that's how it was originally made, like a Shakerato. name: Four Poster Red

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
